## Checklist

- [ ] I've tested this locally (`npm run tauri:dev` or `npm run dev:all`)
- [ ] Python tests pass (`pytest`)
- [ ] Linting passes (`ruff check src/`)
- [ ] No new `any` types in TypeScript
- [ ] No secrets or credentials in the diff
